## üöÄ Recommended Execution Strategy

2. **Wave 2 (Weeks 5-10):** Sequential with minor parallelization (Epic 8.1 starts early)
3. **Wave 3 (Weeks 11-18):** Strictly sequential with validation gates

### Critical Success Factors

- **README.md conflict resolution** in Wave 1 (Track 3 before Track 4)
- **Epic 7 completion** before Epic 8 can start (i18n dependency)
